function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of green spaces in urban environments","Impact":"Negative effect on physical and mental health due to reduced exposure to natural environments","Mitigation":"Increase the presence of visible and accessible green elements and spaces in urban areas","Technologies":"Urban planning and architectural design for integrating green spaces into urban environments","People":"Inhabitants of urban areas","Owner":"Planners, architects, and public health officers"},{"Description":"Urban heat islands and health impacts of heat waves","Impact":"Increased health risks due to higher urban temperatures and reduced humidity","Mitigation":"Implementation of green spaces to mitigate the urban heat island effect and reduce heat-related health impacts","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, urban cooling technologies, and climate-responsive urban planning","People":"Inhabitants of urban areas","Owner":"Planners, architects, and public health officers"}]}
